caption.p: Total monthly confirmed cases and deaths of COVID-19, January 2020–August 2020. Source: ECDC, 2020; Roser et al., 2020. Key: A = total confirmed cases in January; B = total deaths in January; C = total confirmed cases in February; D = total deaths in February; E = total confirmed cases in March; F = total deaths in March; G = total confirmed cases in April; H = total deaths in April; I = total confirmed cases in May; J = total deaths in May; K = total confirmed cases in June; L = total deaths in June; M = total confirmed cases in July; N = total deaths in July; O = total confirmed cases in August; and P = total death in August. Jan. = January, Feb. = February, Mar. = March, Apr. = April, Jun. = June, Jul. = July, and Aug. = August.
